title: ContextDAO Validation Set
description: Schema for skill validation sets used by the Validation League referee

version.description: Version of the skill this validation set targets

questions.description: Array of test questions with expected outputs

input.description: The user prompt to send to the skill

expected_output.description: Expected output specification. Format depends on match_type.

match_type.description: How to evaluate the response against expected_output

weight.description: Relative weight of this question in scoring (default: 1.0)
